snippet: A season of so much promise for Josh Hamilton, a five-time All-Star who has struggled with drug abuse, ended bitterly Friday with a wild-card loss to the Baltimore Orioles.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that a season of so much promise for Texas Rangers outfielder Josh Hamilton, five-time All-Star who has struggled with addiction, ends bitterly with a wild-card loss to Baltimore Orioles.
lead_paragraph: A season of so much promise for Josh Hamilton, a five-time All-Star who has struggled with drug abuse, ended bitterly Friday with a wild-card loss to the Baltimore Orioles.

headline.seo: A Season of Promise for Josh Hamilton Ends Bitterly
headline.main: Rangers’ Hamilton, Fragile and Remarkable, May Move On
headline.print_headline: Rangers’ Hamilton, Fragile and Remarkable, May Move On
